title: Google Calendar API Reference
description: This is the API reference for the Google Calendar API. It provides details on the various resource types, methods, HTTP requests, and responses available for interacting with calendars and events.

resourceTypes.description: The resource types available in the API

acl.description: Details for the Acl resource type

calendarList.description: Details for the CalendarList resource type

calendars.description: Details for the Calendars resource type

channels.description: Details for the Channels resource type

colors.description: Details for the Colors resource type

events.description: Details for the Events resource type

freebusy.description: Details for the Freebusy resource type

settings.description: Details for the Settings resource type
